name: adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Triple Black

details.description:
The adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Triple Black is made from recycled material made in part with Parley Ocean Plastic.

The sneaker is purely black in color, from the laces to the sole, the tongue, and even the decorative highlights. The adidas trefoil logo is displayed on the top of the tongue, on the heel, and on the front end of the sole. The adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Triple Black also has three stripes on each side of the shoe and is completed with a stretchy knit upper.

The adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Triple Black was released in June of 2021 at the retail price of $140.

name: adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Black Gum

details.description: The adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Black Gum is a sleek and stylish sneaker that combines comfort and performance. Made with recycled materials, the Primeblue upper is a nod to sustainability, while the Boost midsole provides cushioning and energy return. The black colorway is versatile and easy to pair with any outfit, while the gum outsole adds a touch of contrast. Released on June 3, 2021, this sneaker retails for $140. Whether you're running errands or hitting the gym, the adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Black Gum is a reliable and fashionable choice.

name: adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Triple White

details.description:
Since sharing the first NMD R1 sneaker with the world, adidas has figured out ways to incorporate all kinds of colors into its design. The adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Triple White keeps things simple by stripping all the colors from this silhouette to allow its features to shine bright.

This NMD R1 has a Primeblue upper that is made in part out of a yarn that contains 50% recycled polyester along with 50% Parley Ocean Plastic. The all-white upper is also designed to be stretchy so that it's able to provide a sock-like fit that delivers plenty of support. Additionally, this sneaker has a white Boost midsole that delivers lots of cushioning and a white rubber outsole that offers tons of traction.

Our experts have enjoyed seeing all the different colors adidas has worked into the mix while reworking its NMD R1 sneakers, but they all agree that the "Triple White" colorway used here is a nice change of pace. The adidas NMD R1 Primeblue Triple White was released on August 24, 2021, for a $140 retail price.

name: adidas NMD HU Pharrell NERD Chalk White

details.description:
Commemorating the 20th Anniversary of their debut album In Search Of, iconic hip-hop group N.E.R.D. - made up of Pharrell Williams, Chad Hugo, and Shay Haley - added their touch to one of Pharrell's most popular signature models.

The adidas NMD Hu NERD Chalk White features an off-white Primeknit upper with N.E.R.D. logos prominently embroidered. On the heel tab, a "20" graphic is printed to honor the 20 years that have passed since the jumpstart of their career as a group.

The adidas NMD Hu NERD Chalk White released in August of 2021 and retailed for $220.

name: adidas NMD R1 Primeblue White Black Grey

details.description:
The adidas NMD R1 Primeblue White Black Gray has its material made from high performance Primeblue. It comes with a color combination of Core Black, Cloud White and Gray.

The uppers of the adidas NMD R1 Primeblue in White Black Gray are made from PrimeKnit. This is a material that offers high levels of flexibility and stability, and is designed with TPU side clips for extra strength. It’s made from different meshed material for breathability, giving the shoe a sock-like fit provided by the stretch knit design. A grippy outer sole for this shoe is an anti-slip, improving your confidence while walking. The adidas and NMD icons are visible on the sole.

Something that our experts love about the adidas NMD R1 Primeblue White Black Gray is the Boost cushioning technology on the midsoles, which increases comfort, stable feeling, and performance. The shoe was released on August 24th, 2021, at a price of $140.

name: adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Animal Print Ash Grey

details.description:
The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Animal Print Ash Grey was released in part of a continuous collaboration between adidas and musician/artist Pharrell Williams.

The shoes’ upper is constructed using PrimeKnit material, which is lightweight and breathable providing a comfortable snug fit for your feet. The upper showcases an animal print pattern, which is primarily grey with dark spots all over. The midsole also has an ashy grey hue and incorporates Boost technology to provide responsive cushioning and impact absorption during your day-to-day activities. The shoe has minimal branding with only the adidas trefoil logo appearing on the heel tab.

One thing our experts love about the adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Animal Print Ash Grey is the midfoot cage. These shoes have a midfoot cage made from TPU material to provide added support and stability since you can tie the laces as tight or loose as you want. The shoes were released for retail in December 2022 for $220.

name: adidas NMD Hu Pharrell x Billionaire Boys Club Astronaut Blue

details.description:
The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell x Billionaire Boys Club Astronaut Blue was an outcome of collaborative design by adidas and BBC.

The shoe is made of grey rubber, BOOST midsole inserts, and milky-translucent caging, knit digital into a compact piece to minimize waste. The low weight of adidas NMD Hu Pharrell x Billionaire Boys Club Astronaut Blue couples up with a bouncy grey rubber outsole to enhance comfort.

The price of adidas NMD Hu Pharrell x Billionaire Boys Club Astronaut Blue at the time of its first release was $250. This shoe debuted on November 20, 2021.

name: adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Human Race Triple Black Pack

details.description:
The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Human Race Triple Black Pack arrives dressed in an all-black color blocking.

The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Human Race Triple Black Pack features a breathable Primeknit upper sitting atop a full-length Boost midsole. Everything is black on this shoe, with ‘Breathe’ emblazoned in tonal block lettering on the vamp of the right shoe, while ‘Thoughts’ is printed on the left. Finishing off the design is a clear lacing cage on the sides attached to the black midsole and rubber outsole.

The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Human Race Triple Black Pack was released in February 2021 and retailed for $220.

name: adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Black

details.description:
The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Black is the result from a collaboration between Pharrell Williams and adidas. The sneaker display a monochromatic black colorway.

On the shoes, the upper part has a black lace cage system and tonal embroidery that says "Human Race" in Chinese. This is joined by the matching sole unit plugs, two sets of 3M-speckled laces in either white or black, and a black leather heel tab. The co-branded sock liner and heel tab complete the adidas Trefoil and Pharell Williams marking sneaker. Additionally, it features Boost midsole and outsole.

The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Black debuted on 19 November 2020, and retailed at $220.

name: adidas NMD S1 Core Black Grey Four
adidas NMD R1 Core Black (2021)

details.description:
The adidas NMD R1 Core Black 2021 has a Core Black PrimeKnit upper with Core Black tape 3-Stripes branding, EVA plugs, and reflective laces made with 3M technology.

A Core Black Boost midsole and coordinating outsole in white with pops of blue and red makes the shoe´s design. Mesh, a flexible and permeable material, is used to create the upper of the NMD R1 Core Black by adidas. A TPU heel tab is frequently included in this model. This tab offers a hint of visual difference to the shoe and functions as a pull tab for simple on and off. The sneaker's outsole is rubber, which provides traction and grip on a variety of terrain.

Something that we love about the adidas NMD R1 Core Black (2021) is its sock-like construction that offers a snug and comfortable fit. It hugs your foot securely, providing a supportive feel. The adidas NMD R1 Core Black 2021 debuted on March 1st, 2021. It originally retailed at a price of $140.

name: adidas NMD R1 Black Orange Yellow Gradient
adidas NMD S1 Metallic Pack Grey
adidas NMD S1 Footwear White Blue Orange
adidas NMD R1 Cloud White

details.description: The adidas NMD R1 Cloud White is a sleek and stylish sneaker that combines modern design with classic comfort. The upper is made of breathable mesh and synthetic materials, with a clean white colorway that is perfect for any outfit. The Boost midsole provides responsive cushioning for all-day comfort, while the rubber outsole offers excellent traction on any surface. This shoe is perfect for both casual wear and athletic activities, making it a versatile addition to any sneaker collection. The release date for this shoe is June 1, 2021, and the retail price is $140. The NMD R1 Cloud White was also re-released in 2022. Don't miss out on the chance to own this must-have sneaker from adidas.

name: adidas NMD HU Pharrell Orange

details.description:
The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Orange features an orange Primeknit upper with Bright Orange lace cages and EVA insert overlays. An orange Boost sole and outsole completes the design.

The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Orange released in June of 2021 and retailed for $220.

name: adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Chocolate

details.description:
The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Chocolate is a collaborative sneaker from the Pharrell x adidas NMD Hu pack in a Chocolate colorway.

This version of the NMD Hu features a Chocolate Brown Primeknit upper highlighted by Grey detailing on the side cages and speckled laces. Collaborative details include mismatched branding featuring the adidas Trefoil logo and Pharell Williams’ branding on the Brown leather overlay covering the heel pull tab. The text 'Human Race'  si embroidered in Korean on the vamp. A Chocolate Brown Boost sole unit with Grey EVA inserts rounds out this sneaker’s design.

What our experts love about this sneaker is its unique colorway and comfortable fit. The unique chocolate brown colorway makes this sneaker stand out from the traditional bold and bright colors of the NMD Hu line, while the sock-like Primeknit upper hugs the foot for a snug fit. The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Chocolate was released on December 15th, 2020, for a retail price of $220.

name: adidas NMD R1 V3 Cloud White
adidas NMD S1 MAHBS Pharrell Humanrace Light Brown
adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Extra Eye Yellow

details.description:
adidas released this model in its NMD series in 2020. The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Extra Eye Yellow offers a design with a host of features like yellow colors and a modern silhouette. 

The NMD Hu features a Primeknit upper and comes with ‘EYE’ and ‘Extra’ embroidery works on each shoe. This sneaker design features EVA overlays with brighter yellow laces, a signature yellow heel tab, speckled laces, and black tongue trim. Completing the look is a yellow Boost midsole and yellow rubber outsole.

The adidas NMD Hu Pharrell Extra Eye Yellow design was released on November 17th, 2020 with a price point of $220.
